column4: Is there a way to configure individual unity launcher icons to allow more than one instance of a program to be started? I really need more than one instance of  xterm and gvim at a time.
Do you? gvim has :sp, :tabnew, and such. For xterm you can use tmux or screen. :P
That's not really an answer though but
I use screen on remote sessions, so that's kind of out. I guess I could fiddle with colors and the like.
